website_summaries.verdict: A good all-around battery tester for multiple battery types.
pros: Clearly displays available battery life, handles starter load tests and checks the alternator
Long, well-insulated cords (2' to 3') make attaching leads much easier
Tests auto and marine battery life, charging and cranking
cons: The leads may be a little small for some battery terminals

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out $135. per hour dealer charges and keeps us out of DERATE situations! 4mph is Dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very necessary for us Owner Operators! I bought 2! Saves huge money and in our line of work "Time is Money"!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Belton

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my 2015 International Pro Star easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: Joel morin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2011 DD15 this OBD works perfectly on my truck. The main reason I got it was because of the regen option. A definite must have in your tool bag as an O/O.
customer_reviews.author: john thach

customer_reviews.title: Saved time and money verses dealer service
customer_reviews.text: Ease of operation, used for the first time to clear a code, clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great with 2018 Cascadia/DD15.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with 2018 Freightliner Cascadia with dd15. Had check engine light coming on with no noticable problems. The code was for low coolant, even though the coolant was not low. Probably a bad sensor. Reader was able to see live engine data for all components connected to CAN. Tool was also able to initiate a parked Regen. Even though it was not needed, it regenerated for about 4 minutes until it idled back. Tool worked exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Decent Scantool for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well, connects pretty quilckly and the code definitions are spot on from what I've seen. You can do regens on Detroit, Cummins, Maxxforce and I believe 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: NL102 plus works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2017 Cascadia with a DD15. This tool did everything it says it will. I preformed a Regen no problem. So many people knock this tool and I bet it's because they don't know how to use one. The right settings have to be chosen for one and for two a Regen can only be preformed while the engine is running and at operating temp. So all the negative reviews tell me they have no idea what they are doing.
customer_reviews.author: David Bentley

customer_reviews.title: A must have for owner-operators
customer_reviews.text: I carry this scan tool in my International Pro Star. It is very handy to have if my truck has problems while I am on the road. I have already used it to diagnose an ABS problem. While it is not as elaborate as the diagnostic equipment a dealer would have; I would expect that it will diagnose the problem 4 times out of 5. The scanner provides the numerical code and a brief description. With that information; it is possible to do a web search for the make, model, year of truck and the code number. It is likely that there is a description of the problem and a solution online.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far
customer_reviews.text: Worked on my 2002 Mazda 2300 to read/clear a check engine light code. Bought this HD OBD reader because I drive class A trucks and figured it would come in handy out on the road. Comes with a carry case. I'll update after trying it on a few more vehicles/HD trucks. So far works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Doesn;t work as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Does not calibrate nor go into manual regen. 2014 Freightliner Cascadia with DD15 engine and Eaton Fuller manual 10 speed transmission. I went to the manufacturers site, before purchasing, and inserted my truck info to determine which unit was good for my truck and this part number came up NL102P, so I bought it and, after trying it several times, it just says, "Product not supported". Junk! Waste of money and even the manufacturer will not stand behind this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Tried to do a regen on my 2014 international durastar 4300 maxxforce and all this scanner did is make my truck think it had an electrical fault with all of the warning lights on the instrument cluster coming on and flashing with tachometer bouncing up and down. When I could finally get into the dpf section it said function not supported. I turned my truck off and let it sit for a while and the computer reset itself so all is well now except I still need a regen done. Worthless scanner.
customer_reviews.author: reynold21

customer_reviews.title: Useless on heavy duty trucks
customer_reviews.text: Useless on heavy duty trucks. I tried it on Cummins ISX, DD15, VOLVO D13, and PACCAR MX 10. It won't even connect or communicate with the ECM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for basic J1939 codes and OBD-II DOES NOT do ...
customer_reviews.text: Works for basic J1939 codes and OBD-II DOES NOT do ABS or any other systems on light duty OBDII 16-pin vehicles. Worked well on several J1939 jobs, but some earlier ones will not communicate.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy bob

customer_reviews.title: I took the car to the store I purchased the battery from and their professional tester found the battery to be bad, around 50% o
customer_reviews.text: I had a car battery with a 3 year replacement warranty. I used the Quicklynks BA101 Battery Tester at 34 months and it said the battery health was only 50%. I took the car to the store I purchased the battery from and their professional tester found the battery to be bad, around 50% of rated capacity. They replaced the battery for free. So the Quicklynks BA101 Battery Tester quickly more than paid for itself and I have a new battery to get me through the winter. The new battery test result is 100% on the Quicklynks BA101 Battery Tester, giving me even more confidence in the results of testing with the Quicklynks BA101 Battery Tester.
customer_reviews.author: F150 Owner

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Basic...It Works
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised - I was looking for a device that simply checks 12v auto and marine batteries beyond reading the voltage. Can't use a hydrometer any more because they're all sealed. This device does a whole lot of things I probably won't ever need but it does what I want while the battery is still connected to the rest of the system.
customer_reviews.author: CGSailor

customer_reviews.title: This tool will keep you off the tow truck chain 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool, I'm a firm believer leave if you Regen your truck twice a week you won't have to pay those vultures your hard earned money, but what makes it special is that you can Regen will driving, also did you know that T/A scanner can't do DEF pressure sensor calibration i had to go to Freightliner and you know they gave it to me and if I had this tool i could have done it myself. I also have the OTR Regen tool and love it but don't love the price and it doesn't do half what this tool does
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES SWINGER

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE!!! BEWARE!!! Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: After having received my reader, following the instructions EXACTLY, plugging into 2014 International ProStar with Maxxforce engine...the ONLY reading(s) on the screen was stating no communication with ecm. No DTC’s available. NO CODES HAVE SHOWN AT ALL. Attempted regen option...upon which time virtually EVERY warning light on dash lit up!!! I’ll try this device a few more times to see if it will do as advertised; if it does, I’ll change this review. Until that time, it seems as though this piece of (expletive here) will be RETURNED!!! [Some of these products make Amazon look really bad.]
customer_reviews.author: Al...from North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: First off I ordered an NL 102 and an NL 102 Plus. Got two NL102 Pluses. Hooked it up to my Max Force 7 engine because I had codes that I needed to reset in order to regen. Wouldn't even see the codes I could see on my dash. Tried to force a regen "This Function is not supported". Tried to check filter status "This Function is not supported". Read peoples reviews and tried everything I could think of. No luck. Tried to log onto support, they make that difficult at best. So now I have a few hundred less dollars and no solution to my regen issue. It could be a great tool, if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Senn

customer_reviews.title: Reads Maxxforce codes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to read the engine and DPF codes on our MaxxForce 10 diesel installed in a 2014 Holiday Rambler (medium duty engine). Initial operation of scanner did display the codes and sensor readouts. My hope is that this scanner will help monitor/diagnose the DPF operation. Shop could find no failures but I still suspect an intermittent issue. Have not yet used this on our 2014 Honda CRV to read the OBDII codes. Scanner specs claim it will and it does have the proper mating connector.
customer_reviews.author: K. Vance

customer_reviews.title: NOR
customer_reviews.text: This product DOES NOT MANUALLY REGENERATE ISUZU NPR trucks .Tried it on mine and it did not work.Just wanted to let everyone know.
customer_reviews.author: j.johnson

customer_reviews.title: Handy device
customer_reviews.text: I do like this tester. Takes a lot of guess work out of determining whether a battery is good or bad. The only thing to be careful of is testing brand new batteries that haven't been used in anything yet (it will tell you that they need to be replaced). Other than that, this will be in my tool box for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Volvo’s
customer_reviews.text: Overall i think it’s a great unit and works on many different types of vehicles. It does not do anything with the DPF system on a volvo engine D13. I wished it would have been more clear the engines it covers but most other engines it can do a lot of things. It will read the codes of a Volvo Engine D13 just not reset the DPF system or force a regen like it will other engines.
customer_reviews.author: Nasketcase

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and undamaged. Works great! A must have if you have an RV or motorhome. However if you want to load test the batteries (I advise you do) you will need to get a load tester for around $20 - 25. But this unit does do an internal cell resistance test as well among other tests, in or our of circuit.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT perform parked regen as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product does NOT do what it advertises. I bought it for the specific purpose of performing parked regen on my 2014 Freightliner Cascadia with DD15 engine. “The Function Not Supported!” is the only message that comes up. There is no tech support or software updates available for this product from the NexLink website. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the glued cover came off (on 2 diff units)
customer_reviews.text: I got this and immediately saw the glued cover (the "up, down, enter, exit" label) fell off during shipping. I tried to press it back on but no deal. I returned it and got another with exact same problem. I compared it with a picture I took and it was different unit. So this is a consistent problem. I forgot to act on it and now the return period expired and I'm stuck with brand new tester with tape all over it. Fail !!!
customer_reviews.author: Wacky Techy

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it diagnosed and cleared the Airbag light error on my 2006 Kia Sportage so I'm pleased. Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 5 stars, but since you need a PC running XP or Win7 to update and it won't work on Win10, I'm only giving it 4. Other than that it diagnosed and cleared the Airbag light error on my 2006 Kia Sportage so I'm pleased. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Effy

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: I cant really prove accuracy. It however seems to work really well i have tested probably 12 batteries since I bought it. It has helped me determine some batteries I thought were good were actually bad. And two expensive batteries I thought were bad were actually good. So it has been totally worth the investment so far. I am really impressed with how much information the reader will spit out.
customer_reviews.author: Tweakes182

customer_reviews.title: 2013 Cascadia with a DD15
customer_reviews.text: I have 2013 Cascadia with a DD15. Someday the engine check light goes on, I was a little panic for a while. They'd go on and off. With this NL102PLUS scanner I was able to erase the codes and turn check engine light off. So far I have driven for more than 200 miles, no problems at all. I'm so pleased with this scan tool especially for the price. Wanna share my store and highly recommend this to every Cascadia drivers, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: David lee

customer_reviews.title: It works great most of the time
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scan tool on Detroits, Cummins, Paccars, an Isuzu, a John deere, and several cars and have had pretty good success with it. Pros: You can read/clear codes, get live readings from the engine which you can select and put in a list or graph and (supposedly) you can force regen. Not all scan tools can read paccar codes correctly but this one can. Cons: Occasionally hard freezes you have to restart to get out of, the graph is upside down and somewhat glitched, I tried on two different vehicles and so far haven't been able to force regen. Overall: Not perfect by any stretch but has definitely saved me time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Arvin Krause

customer_reviews.title: This product is great to use before you buy a used car
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing all the time. Works flawlessly. Had an AGM battery on a Mercedes that I had no idea how old it was. I was experiencing long cranks after the car sat for a few days. One day the car would not start after sitting for about 5 days. Bought this to test, and showed that while I had plenty of volts, I only had 4% of the available cranking amps. Ouch. This product is great to use before you buy a used car. You can negotiate the price of the car down if it shows you have to replace the battery as soon as you drive away. Worth the money. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CObuyer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as stated.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2010 International Prostar with a Cummins ISX. This tool is only good for reading codes. Tool does NOT clear codes, does NOT do a forced DPF regeneration, it says "The Function Not Supported!" The description is very wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do forced regen update 6/16/2020
customer_reviews.text: So because of this review they have contacted me and try to pay me 30$ to remove this review 8/21/20 shady company to deal with Does not do forced regen waste of 200 bucks Update few days later I will do parked regen when in service menu gotta let it catch up to the ecm of the truck takes 30 seconds when on me in my photos you’ll see the three items say na well if you scroll to that menu and wait for them to change then it worked little confusing
customer_reviews.author: snowman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the add!
customer_reviews.text: Half the reviews are right , this thing doesn’t work , IT WILL NOT PREFORM A FORCED REGEN ON ANYTHING ! It’s a scam , you read the disclaimer in the booklet , and it says it’s for information proposes only ..Cummins , international Isuzu so far not supported ?? Only gives you a few of the current codes and it says all over about you can get free updates , there’s not one word in the instructions about how or where . You goto the website and it’s nonexistent ? However it is fast and has minimal capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Collmer

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought to read codes on a 1999 Ford F500 with a 7.3 engine. Engine light is on and it says no codes. Ended up going to shop anyway and spent more money just to get codes. Also tried it on my 2011 Ram 1500 5.7 Hemi. Only a couple more sensor readings than my $20 horror freight scanner. Don't waste your money on this over hyped generic reader.
customer_reviews.author: William V.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty truck diesel scan tool rip off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool to run forced regeneration when needed for my 2015 freightliner Cascadia I was able to force regen once it says not supported can’t even get a hold off an agent or customer service as there ain’t any apparently screen turns upside down for the price they could have done a better job very not happy with this product will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Jose F.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a scanner for my truck, and I chose this NL102P over others, because of the reasonable price, and the feature that it can read a lot of vehicle information, which is not available from other scanners. I notice that there are many 2 in 1 scanners on Amazon, which support OBD/EOBD and heavy duty OBD diagnosis, but I already have one obd2 scanner for my cars, just look for one only made for my 2010 Freightliner with Cummins motor.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work as advertised. It won't reset services as advertised and there is no support at all 3 weeks and they still haven't responded to my email. I sent mine back. The shop failed to reset the fuel filter service and this device was supposed to do that, but it won't. I will be buying a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Display
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heavy duty code reader for my father. He like it! This works pretty well, It is very handy to have if his truck has problems. He said works great on his 2013 Maxxforce. He said the function super helpful, read ECU information, read fault code, erase fault code and live data! Good device He recommended it helped he a lot easy to understand!
customer_reviews.author: John D Staggs

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK ON Cummins X15 engines
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to do simple DTC read and clearing codes. We have a 2019 Pete 389 with a X15 in it. it will read codes but does not clear codes. The emission function of this scammer also does not work the tool says vehicle does not support this function. hopefully there will be an update to the software soon. if you have older equipment it might be just fine but it doesn't seem to work at all for the X15 engine.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not the most durable construction, but hey, it's a scanner not a hammer. Does everything it says that it does in the description. Very easy to use, perfect for someone new to the field that cant afford the 5k scanners. Or if you're like me, this one will be used for mobile service, so I can keep the expensive one at the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Anel Sax

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Bought it around May 2020. Didn't use it until July 2020. Just to find out this Scan Tool doesn't work as advertised. My unit will perform Forced Regen, but will not read fault codes and cannot clear codes or history. It will say "Success" after attempting to clear codes but nothing will change and Lights still on dash with fault codes. Truly disappointed in the functionality. At this point I cannot recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Function not supported
customer_reviews.text: Would not do regen or clear hist DTC codes on cummins isb 6.7. I followed all instructions. Ended up purchasing another one same thing but missing cable also. Purchased diff brand and regen worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scanner did not preform the ABS Electronic Brake Module test and automatic brake bleed.
customer_reviews.author: dougm38

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what is advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diagnostic to force a regin on a 2013 freightliner with a detroit engine. It clearly has a procedure to do it, but says the application is not supported. I tried several times with no success. The manual is not very good at all. The help button is useless. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Plattsmier

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to have in your tool box, I've already used it multiple times on my Tacoma and Civic. Diagnosed the problem and bought the parts needed, replaced them and cleared the check engine light.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This scanner can work on HD!!! But....
customer_reviews.text: I used this scanner to read and clear codes from a 2011 International class 8. You should find the electrical builder's manual for your rig and verify bus protocol first. International uses CAN and ATA buses; they overlap but have different workings. I will update this review if/when I can get the scanner to trigger a parked DPF regen. It also works nicely on light duty OBDII vehicles (1996+). UPDATE - tried to do a parked DPF regen on a 2011 Daystar, and none of the DPF options worked. Either they came back as "Function not Supported" or couldn't see parking brake status to start. I will make sure the dash sees the parking brake...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it says it is capable of doing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest false advertised piece of trash. Thought I would've learned the first time dealing with this technical support staff. They don't get back to you in a timely manner . Totally disgusted
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Need to have tool if u work on cars
customer_reviews.text: Great tester. Was tired of going to an auto parts store every time I was helping people troubleshoot there car problems. Now I know right there if the battery is good. Or the car not charging like it should. Paid for its self in gas running to and from the parts store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very compolicated to work with
customer_reviews.text: Had to pass few hour on internet to use it. I was a mecanic for the family business but no body could help me.Also i try to light off a check engine on a Cummins isb300 engine but the scan can not do it. iut saw it can not erease the code. But the instruction on Nexlink say it can. Beleive i going to retrurn it
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could get a full refund
customer_reviews.text: Thing is trash It does almost absolutely nothing it's worked for a very few vehicles do not buy this you are wasting your money
customer_reviews.author: TIM

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice tester that provides peace of mind. The battery in my truck was pushing 4 years old and with cold weather coming I was nervous. Sure enough, this tester recommended replacing the battery. I also tested on my wife's vehicle with a year old battery and it tested fine so I'm fairly confident in its testing ability. It also tests the cranking power and charging system.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ames

customer_reviews.title: Fast information-code reader
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok but was still not able to clear code even temporary on a allison trans. It did give me the codes needed to have a quick in or out of service on fire apparatus. For what the price was Ill keep it .
customer_reviews.author: nt4show

customer_reviews.title: I bought this so I can regen my 2015 isuzu ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can regen my 2015 isuzu hd truck and it did not do it and clearly it says it does do not buy for isuzu trucks does not work
customer_reviews.author: andy cordova

customer_reviews.title: 2017 freightliner cascadia can't read any codes
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I got a none working scan tool or if it's just not compatible with a 2017 freightliner cascadia but this tool won't read any codes and keep saying Communication error i made for sure that it's got a great connection but nothing
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dobyne

customer_reviews.title: Try at your own risk.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to do Regan's on my 09 international prostar. Notice some times after you unplug the unit from the truck sometimes the dash gauges dont work??? And I have to cycle the key 2-3 on and off to make the gauges on the dash board to work again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for International Prostar
customer_reviews.text: The item is nice and the screen is clear and big enough for work. I bought it because it said it will regen a Cummins engine, but I have a 2015 international Prostar with ISX15 and it won’t work for my truck, too bad because I liked the tool.
customer_reviews.author: fermin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. I rarely see large diesel trucks at my shop but once in a while a fleet needs one serviced. I wasn't about to spend big bucks for these rare occasions so I decided to try this and was completely satisfied with the easy operation and functionality of this.
customer_reviews.author: TexasJeffy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my boats 1150CCA battery and it worked perfectly. Very easy to use. Takes the guess work out of determining a battery's state.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this product to do a Force regen on a 2014 Freightliner Cascadia and it will not work
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I used it on my Freightliner to clear old codes and it worked great. I just with it was in a hard ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it works. I used it on my Freightliner to clear old codes and it worked great. I just with it was in a hard case to keep it from getting damaged.
customer_reviews.author: akboone

customer_reviews.title: it works great! Known weak batteries are flagged correctly
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on a lot of different sized batteries ... it works great! Known weak batteries are flagged correctly. You just enter the CCA rating the is posted on all 12V transportation-type batteries and the complete analysis comes up in about 5 seconds. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: It might be ok still testing
customer_reviews.text: Only thing i will say so far is it won't connect to my chevy c7500 2002 truck with a 3126 cat engine . It won't connect to my 2004 toyota passo car it won't connect to my nissan car . I'm going to keep it because it did connect to my GMC 2006 c8500 i think it might have a iszue engine in it so i'll test it out with this and see how many other vechical it will work with and the vechical it won't work with.
customer_reviews.author: john williams

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Had to test 3 batteries. It actually found one of three that we're bad. It told me the health of the battery, so I didn't waste time charging it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Z

customer_reviews.title: The shipping and packaging was was great got my product thank you
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with this product but I’m not dissatisfied either does not do all it claims to do.The not supported function works well
customer_reviews.author: James Patrick Evans

customer_reviews.title: Could never get to work - returned item
customer_reviews.text: Tried 3 times - 6 hours total trying to get product to sync up to 2016 Peterbilt but never got to work - returned item
customer_reviews.author: Krista Oslin

customer_reviews.title: but the unit worked good on my Toyota FJ ABS
customer_reviews.text: would have given it 5 stars but its very hard to update & when I tried to register it , my ser # does not even show up as real. but the unit worked good on my Toyota FJ ABS problem
customer_reviews.author: chad jones

customer_reviews.title: Its not a very useful scan tool
customer_reviews.text: Small compact , nice viewing screen,but it does not seem to like it should especial at reading and clearing DTC, doing a force rsgen
customer_reviews.author: Pro Tech

customer_reviews.title: It do not work with all the models stated. ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on a 2014 Mack. I have three diagnostic codes that was verified by the dealer. This unit stated no codes found. The only things read was the vin# and rpm.
customer_reviews.author: JST

customer_reviews.title: Quicklinks Battery Tester.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this battery checker. It tests batteries in or out of the vehicle and many different types of batteries too. It tests the battery. It tests the charging system and the starting load.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Dont take the chance
customer_reviews.text: Product worked for 16 pin 2017 Camry, but not my 2014 dd15 cascadia. Says "no communication with dtc. No tech support or updates. Completely worthless for my cascadia
customer_reviews.author: ExeTrans Solutions LLC

customer_reviews.title: will not force regenerate diesel
customer_reviews.text: I have tried on 3 different maxforce engines and it always says to set parking brake. Parking brake has been set on all 3 trucks with parking light on the dash. 10K snap on tool is better of course but this would have been nice for satellite branches.
customer_reviews.author: Fleet Manager

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Product is absolutely terrible. Do not buy. Get one from Grainger s. I bought this for use on our 26 foot box trucks. We have 12 trucks international and freight liners. Doesn’t work on any. I thought maybe because it needed to be updated. Nexastech.com is the website listed. It doesn’t exist. You will not be able to update this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2019 International Cummins. Did not work. I don’t like writing reviews but they emailed me and bugged me way to muck so here it is. It did not work. I tried to clear the service light and it did not let me although it said it was able to. I do not recommend this product. I had to return it and got my full refund back.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Works only as code scanner
customer_reviews.text: It works as a code reader, nothing else. 2016 kw w900 with a 2013 isx Cummins. I bought this tool to force regen on my DPF since I idle a lot and wanted to be able to do regens more often. Sadly I get the function not supported error when I try to regen the truck. It does work as a code scanner so it's not completely useless. Not worth 180$ imho.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gringeri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good device I recommended it helped me a lot easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: Charles Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: This scanner read about 5 trucks. Now it won't regen or read codes on anything. VERY UNHAPPY!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: To expensive for what it's worth
customer_reviews.text: It's a good scan tool how ever it will not force Regen any motor I have hooked it up to it reads and clears code the price is too much for what it does if your going to be buying this I would say it should have been better and doesn't have auto bleed for abs systems even though competitors have a 60 scan tool that will kind of disappointed with it
customer_reviews.author: Brett morris

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fits in any kind of trucks and cars, diesel or gasoline. Worth it! Totally recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Leandro Silva

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was useless. Would not communicate with my 2005 Acura MDX. Would not perform a regen on my Freightliner M2 106 with a Cummins ISL. It is going back!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Garbage don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Doesn't do regen's, causes abs and transmission codes when connected. Used on freightlines, kenworths, internationals, isuzus, etc. Not worth the price. Inferior scan tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: sometimes you have to scroll on all protocols to read codes on heavy duty trucks, webpage for upgrades is down
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It does regens on 2014 Cascadia DD15 so long as the prompted conditions are met!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product primarily to perform parked regens on my 2014 Freightliner Cascadia until we figured out why it wasn't doing the regens on its own. It did do the regens on my truck with the Detroit DD15 engine! Probably did 5 or 6 regens using this scan tool before finding that the DPF pressure sensor was bad. Great tool to have!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Well worth $$  works as described
customer_reviews.text: Easily navagable,. Uses as described and reads clears and help troubleshoot with a variety of tech support and input and top fixes. Well worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: T.W.L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2010 peterbilt with Cummings isx will not support DPF. Or erase codes or reset sensors or do regen .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the reviews
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work as advertised. It couldn't read anything but the battery voltage. Some that wrote reviews about it lied.it wouldn't work on my 2007 peterbilt 379 with a acert c15 Caterpillar.it wouldn't even read a abs code still ended up going to a shop that cost me more than this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R.

customer_reviews.title: Bmw
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my 2004 bmw z4 3.0i ... no issues... did exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Josiah J.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, Plugged into my 18 Freightliner and I was able to browse much more than I thought I would be. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Volvo
customer_reviews.text: Days it works for Volvo but when you plug it in Volvo isn’t even an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Long wires so you can hook it ...
customer_reviews.text: Lost my mac battery tester. Replaced it with this. Awesome product. Long wires so you can hook it up to the battery if its in the engine bay and see the screen from inside.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy menu interface
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy menu interface. Item construction is adequate for home use but may not be robust enough for professional usage.
customer_reviews.author: Yoboslayer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it saids it does
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't do what it saids. Wont force regen any trucks that I have connected to. This is not right dont make your product seem like its going to do something its not. Dont buy this scan tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not Regen my freightliner's 2012 Detroit eng or 2013 cummins
customer_reviews.text: Will not do Regen on 2013 cascadia with Cummins or with 2012 Detroit. works to clear most codes and helps diagnose others but I can get that done with a much cheaper one only reason I bout it was for the regen and it doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.author: William James Irwin SR.

customer_reviews.title: The 16 pin adapter is damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in Feb 10 for just fault code readings and regen, but my adapter had inside teeth damage, so it will be on/off when you connect it . It will not have a good connection . They promised to send a new adapter but changed their mind later. Now, I took my last semester this spring so I m not busy anymore. I will fight them, as I have the proof that they promised to send a new adapter.
customer_reviews.author: ayan suleiman

customer_reviews.title: Does not scan abs sensor
customer_reviews.text: Item does not scam abs sensor for 2013 hino. I still had to take it to hino stealer to diagnose the problem which cost $361. It's also $60 cheaper on Ebay
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my Mercedes R500. This is an item that will pay for itself. It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Monster PG

customer_reviews.title: Comes complete & ready to plug in....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use . . Cleared my codes on my 2012 Freightliner. . . . Helped troubleshoot check eng. Lite codes. Very happy with product....
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hufham

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with semi trucks
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work with semi trucks, Peterbilt or Cummins.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Created ECM errors where I had none!
customer_reviews.text: 2017 Tiffin RV w/Cummins 5.0/V8. It creates ABS and TCM comm errors that it has to clear.
customer_reviews.author: Gail H

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Could have spent double on the tool truck. The exact same tool. Diagnose quickly and results canbe shown right to customer.
customer_reviews.author: B Mounce

customer_reviews.title: no good for paccar mx 13
customer_reviews.text: pretty much worthless for paccar mx13. have not been able to clear any codes. keeps saying failed to clear. might be great for other products just not paccar
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wojcik

product_meta.title: Heavy Duty Truck Scan Tool NL102 Plus Auto Scanner with DPF/Sensor Calibration/Oil Reset + Check Engine for Cars; Truck & Car 2 in 1 Code Reader (Upgrade Version)
feature_bullets: NL102PLUS HEAVY DUTY diagnostic scanner from NEXAS supports all heavy duty trucks in compliance with standard protocols ( J1587，J1939 and J1708 Class 4- class 8 trucks). And also engine check diagnostic for all passenger cars & light duty vehicles from 1996 on.

Trucks appliance: for Cummings, for Detroit, for Maxxforce, for Caterpillar, for Freightliner, for International, for Kenworth, for John Deere, for Peterbilt, for Sterling, for Mack, for Paccar, for Westernstar, for Mecedes Benz, for Volvo, for Scania, for Man, for Renault, for ERF, for Foden, for Seddon-Atkinson, for Iveco, for DAF, for SISU, for STEYR, for ISUZU; and all Cars /min vans / light duty from 1996.

DPF Regeneration And Oil Service Reset: Force DPF regen for Cummings, Detroit, Maxxforce, ISUZU, and HINO from 2010 till now . Oil service reset for Cummings, Detroit, Maxxforce from 2010 till now . (Note: Water Temperature is higher than 80 Degree and engine at idle speed for at least 10 minutes. )

Supported Truck Systems: engine, transmission, instrument panel, drivetrain, braking system, suspension, ABS, ESP, EPS, fuel system and more, which are in compliance with J1939, J1708 and J1587 protocols. Generally for American HD trucks ( Class4-Class8) are from 2006 on.

FREE UPDATE & EXCELLENT SERVICE----2. 8 inch TFT color screen design and user friendly software interface guide you to operate it as easy as pie. We provide one year & lifetime free software online update and professional service team for your any questions within 24 hours.
